decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (HH91-01, dated 17/04/13, received 30/04/13; HH91-02, dated 17/04/13, received 30/04/13; HH91-03, undated, received 30/04/13; HH91-04, dated 17/04/13, received 31/05/13; HH91-05, dated 17/04/13, received 31/05/13; HH91-06, undated, received 31/05/13; and Design and Access Statement, undated, received 31/05/13) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension to the building.
